attributes.additional_details: we have watched this woman as she gone against everything the British electorate voted for and is hoping to bethe next prime minister she should be desele ed now
attributes.background: Amber Rudd has proved herself to be an incompetent MPin more ways than one she has continually gone against the electorate of her constituency and the british public so we are calling for her deselection

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of their political party
